biography: Michael Higgins was born on January 20, 1920 in Brooklyn, New York City,  New York, USA as Michael Patrick Higgins Jr. He was an actor, known for  State and Main (2000), Springfield Story (1952) and Der Dialog (1974). He was married to Elizabeth Lee Goodwin. He died on November 5, 2008 in Manhattan, New York City.
name: Michael Higgins
